name: 筆譯研究方法專論
description: This course aims to investigate the issues that translation studies is concerned. It is predominantly theoretical, though examples from actual translation practice will be used.
goals: To investigate the issues that translation studies is concerned.
syllabus:
(Tentative schedule)

\# 1  Introduction; an overview of the seminar

\# 2  Reading: Ch. 1 Research and Writing from _MLA_; Williams & Chesterman, Intro. & Ch. 1; 高育慈：有顏色的翻譯

                      **Due: search websites**

\# 3  Reading: Ch. 2 Plagiarism; Williams & Chesterman, Ch. 2 顏志翔：從書面到台面

        **Due: one-paragraph fuzzy idea for your research topic**              

\# 4  Reading: Ch. 3 The Mechanics of Writing; Williams & Chesterman, Ch. 3 & 4; 蔡惠伃 超譯《道德經》：新時代風格的三種《道德經》英譯本 

**Due: library search**

\# 5  Reading: Ch. 4 The Format of the Research Paper

            Williams & Chesterman, Ch. 5; 林卓君：[西方舌尖上的食色中國—析論《金瓶梅》兩譯者飲食翻譯策略](http://etds.lib.ntnu.edu.tw/cgi-bin/gs/ntnugsweb.cgi?ccd=q09JM2&o=sid=%22GN0699250109%22.&v=-1)

**Due: Preliminary project title and a general research question/hypothesis with**

**sub-questions**

\# 6  Reading: Ch. 5 Documentation: Preparing the List of Works Cited 

Williams & Chesterman, Ch. 6 & 7; 蔡孟儒：諾貝爾迷夢：遠景與九五文化《諾貝爾文學獎全集》翻譯出版研究

\# 7  演講

                        **Due: A well-defined, operational research hypothesis and a proposed research plan with bibliography**

\# 8  Reading: Ch. 6 Documentation: Citing Sources in the Text

            Williams & Chesterman, Ch. 8, 9 & 10; 徐嘉妍：詮釋夢想

\# 9  \*Individual Discussions of Proposals

#10  Reading: Chesterman, Andrew & Emma Wagner. 2002. _Can Theory Help Translators?: A Dialogue between the Ivory Tower and the Wordface._ Manchester: St. Jerome.

#11  Reading: Wang, Der-wei, “Translating Taiwan: A Study of Four English Anthologies of Taiwan Fiction;” 〈一九八○年代初期的台灣小說〉

#12  Reading: David Damrosch, “Translation and World Literature: Love in the Necropolis;” Lawrence Venuti, “Translation Studies and World Literature”

#13  Reading: 孔慧怡《重寫翻譯史》

#14  Reading: Kwame Anthony Appiah, “Thick Translation”; 趙睿音，〈從「稠密翻譯」角度看翻譯小說之譯註—以安潔拉．卡特為例〉

#15  Reading: 夏曉虹〈羅蘭夫人在中國〉Hu Ying, “Madame Roland and Her Chinese Sisters”

#16  Reading: 劉禾《跨語際實踐》（Lydia Liu, _Translingual Practice_）

#17  Reading: 張明敏。《村上春樹文學在台灣翻譯與文化》

#18  Paper Due
